body: Last time I remember funkystudios was the owner,what happened to him and who is the new owner now?
body_tagged: Last time I remember funkystudios was the owner,what happened to him and who is the new owner now?
title: Sorry for the dumb question

replies.body: He's still here, he just got a new account named "KyloCode".
replies.body_tagged: He's still here, he just got a new account named "KyloCode".

reply_to.body: He's still here, he just got a new account named "KyloCode".
reply_to.body_tagged: He's still here, he just got a new account named "KyloCode".

replies.body: Yep. First he was called funkystudios, then he bought a new account: IvyCode, and renamed it to KyloCode
replies.body_tagged: Yep. First he was called funkystudios, then he bought a new account: IvyCode, and renamed it to KyloCode
